content:
The possible meeting times that work for Raymond, Billy, and Donald's schedules and respect Billy's preference to avoid meetings after 15:00 are 9:30-10:00, 11:00-11:30, 13:30-14:00, and 14:30-15:00. Among these, 11:00-11:30 is selected as it is a convenient morning slot without any immediate conflicts before or after for any participant.

- Raymond is free from 9:30 to 11:30, so 11:00-11:30 is within this window.
- Billy has no meetings between 10:30 and 12:00, so 11:00-11:30 is available.
- Donald is free from 11:00 to 12:00, so 11:00-11:30 is available.

This time also adheres to Billy's preference by ending before 15:00.

{"time_range": "{11:00:11:30}", "day": "Monday"}
